attributes.action: Legalise Amsterdam style coffee shops within the uk under strict conditions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition for the prime minister to issue licences within the uk for 'Cannabis' coffee shops. These would be well regulated, subject to tax and have a strict age limit. These coffee shops would also provide education and information on cannabis, and other drugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
